                        <ProductServiceDescription>Carpet and Carpet Removal/Installation
The contractor shall be required to furnish all materials, equipment, labor and personnel necessary to manage and accomplish all work in accordance with the Statement of Work dated 28 May 2020 to provide, remove and install flooring in Bldg 1323 Dorms at Eglin AFB, FL. The carpet materials to be used are Mohawk 3OL in 727 Priority, as outlined in the pricing sheet submitted in response to the solicitation.
</ProductServiceDescription>
